definition: school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs

sentences.english: The zen influences more tremendous to China from of old.
sentences.chinese: 自古到今，禪宗對中國的影響是巨大的。

sentences.english: Yunmen Temple is the birthplace of Yunmen Sect, one of the five Chan Sects.
sentences.chinese: 雲門寺則是禪宗五大派之一的雲門宗的發祥地。

sentences.english: The Zen yoga deep dragon stretch will produce a much deeper feeling of stretching.
sentences.chinese: 禪宗瑜伽伸展深龍會產生更深刻的感覺伸展。

sentences.english: "We make more people know about Zen Buddhism, " he says.
sentences.chinese: “我們使越來越多的人開始瞭解禪宗佛法，”他說。

sentences.english: The Zen yoga far-hand dragon stretch stretches along the leg and the back.
sentences.chinese: 禪宗瑜伽遠的手伸龍沿着腿和背部伸展。

sentences.english: The essence of the extrication of Chan sect is the freedom of life.
sentences.chinese: 禪宗解脫的實質是生命的自由。

sentences.english: Traditional Zen retreats are held in silence.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的禪宗靜修就是在安靜中進行的。

sentences.english: The monks here practise Seon, or Zen Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的和尚修煉的是禪宗佛教。

sentences.english: What can be more Zen than a bit of silence?
sentences.chinese: 還有什麼比一點安靜更禪宗了呢？

sentences.english: Several rate method, but the road of zen Buddhism introduction.
sentences.chinese: 數息法，乃禪宗入門之途。

sentences.english: Zen monks will go so far as to hit you with a stick.
sentences.chinese: 禪宗修道士會走這麼遠來用棍子打你。

sentences.english: Zen philosophy, is the aesthetics of Chinese art in important areas.
sentences.chinese: 禪宗的禪境理念，是中國藝術美學中的重要範疇。

sentences.english: Chinese Dhyana embodies a concentracted reflection of the inspiration and intelligence of Chinese literati.
sentences.chinese: 中國的禪宗凝聚了中國古代文人的靈感與智慧。

sentences.english: Marcel Duchamp's doings are very similar to Koan of Zend Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 杜尚的行動頗似禪宗的棒喝。

sentences.english: Ma is studying Zen Buddhism from his Lao Shi (teacher) Gong Qian Cai Rang.
sentences.chinese: 馬先生目前正在研究禪宗，受教於恭喬才讓大師。

definition: honorific title for a Buddhist monk
gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
to pass on doctrines from master to disciple (Buddhism)
to practice Chan Buddhist meditation/to practice Zen meditation/to sit in meditation
founder (of a craft, religious sect etc)
Avatamsaka sutra of the Huayan school/also called Buddhavatamsaka-mahavaipulya Sutra, the Flower adornment sutra or the Garland sutra
(of a deity) to take a material shape/to appear
monk (Sanskrit: Sramana, originally refers to north India)/Buddhist monk
Amur cork tree (Phellodendron amurense)/cork-tree bark (Chinese medicine)
